attributes.action: Call for British intervention to bring lasting solution to the Tibetan issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We remain committed to finding a lasting solution that will mutually benefit the Tibetans as well as the Chinese people. We support the Dalai Lama in His seeking genuine autonomy for Tibet within the constitutional framework of the People's Republic of China. Jawaharlal Nehru, Prime Minister of India, 1959 - I believe, just as propagated by China, that the last voice regarding Tibet should be the voice of the Tibetan people and nobody else's. 


Thank you!
